section.description: Used with the Grid and UX components.

item.name: Method for defining menu
item.description: Specify how the menu will be defined. If the menu choices are not dynamic, then you can use the 'Menu Builder' or 'Static JSON String'. If you want the choices to be dynamic, use Xbasic function. Choices include *[ui:Menu Builder]*, *[ui:Static JSON String]*, *[ui:Xbasic Function]*.

item.name: Xbasic function
item.description: Specify the name of the Xbasic function to call to generate the menu choices

item.name: Javascript function
item.description: Specify the name of the Javascript function to call to generate the menu choices

item.name: Menu position
item.description: Specify where the menu will be shown.

item.name: Menu name
item.description: (Optional) Specify a name for the menu. If you specify a name you will be able to use Javascript to get a pointer to the menu object. You can leave this blank or use <Default> to use a system generated name. If you specify a name, it must be unique to this menu.

item.name: Icon column width
item.description: Specify the width of the icon column. This is the column to the left of the menu choices where optional menu icons are shown.

item.name: Has pointer icon
item.description: Specify if the window has a pointer icon that points to the element that was clicked to show the window.

item.name: Pointer position
item.description: Specify the window edge that has the pointer icon. If you select 'Auto' the most appropriate edge is automatically selected. Choices include *[ui:Auto]*, *[ui:Top]*, *[ui:Bottom]*, *[ui:Left]*, *[ui:Right]*.

item.name: Menu height
item.description: The height of the menu window. The height is defined using CSS units (200px, 1.5in, etc). This property is optional. If not defined, the menu height will be computed automatically.

item.name: Menu width
item.description: The width of the menu window. The width is defined using CSS units (200px, 1.5in, etc). This property is optional. If not defined, the menu width will be computed automatically.

item.name: Animation
item.description: Specify if the window should be animated when it is shown or hidden.

item.name: Show animation style
item.description: Select the animation method to use when the window is shown. Fade and Slide use methods in jQuery core. Other options require jQueryUI.

item.name: Show animation speed
item.description: Specify the animation speed. You can select a pre-defined option (slow = 600 milliseconds, fast = 200 milliseconds), or you can enter an explicit value in milliseconds.

item.name: Hide animation style
item.description: Select the animation method to use when the window is closed. Fade and Slide use methods in jQuery core. Other options require jQueryUI.

item.name: Hide animation speed
item.description: Specify the animation speed. You can select a pre-defined option (slow = 600 milliseconds, fast = 200 milliseconds), or you can enter an explicit value in milliseconds.

step.description: Click the [...] button next to the Menu Definition Property
Create a list of choices for the dropdown using the Tree Data Genie.
Javascript Functions page click on the Action Javascript genie and add the dropdown action to the component.
